sentences.sContent: They argued, but he remained obdurate.
sentences.sCn: 他们发生了争论，但他还是固执己见。

synos.tran: 顽固的，执拗的；冷酷无情的

remMethod.val: ob(表加强) + dur(持续) + ate → 非常坚持的 → 固执的

trans.tranCn: 冷酷无情的, 顽固的, 执拗的
trans.tranOther: very determined not to change your beliefs, actions, or feelings, in a way that seems unreasonable
